plot1 <- df %>%
  filter(Question == 1) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Gender, y = Value, fill = Likert)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "fill") +
  labs(title = "Bar chart split by gender",
       x = "Gender",
       y = "Value",
       fill = "Likert Scale") +
  theme_minimal() +
  coord_flip() %>%
